definition: One key opens one lock./There is a different solution for each problem. (idiom)
pinyin: yi1 ba3 yao4 shi5 kai1 yi1 ba3 suo3

definition: Today is the key to the past.
pinyin: xian4 zai4 shi4 guo4 qu5 yao4 shi5

sentences.english: Show me the nails and the post hole digger and I'll be able to do a job that pleases you.
sentences.chinese: 給我釘子和匙形取土器，我會做一個叫你滿意的工作。

sentences.english: A cutlery set includes knives, forks, spoons etc.
sentences.chinese: 一套餐具包括刀，叉，匙等。

sentences.english: For example, key money is used to minimize dissipation of rent under rent control. (2)
sentences.chinese: 例如，在價格管制下的匙金便是減低租值消散的方法。

sentences.english: The most common is on the walls of the plug itself.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的痕跡存在於匙路內壁上。

sentences.english: The only parameter is a name for the new key pair.
sentences.chinese: 惟一的參數是新密匙對的名稱。

sentences.english: The scanning plane of the coronal dynamic keyhole imaging was parallel to the combining site.
sentences.chinese: 冠狀位動態匙孔成像掃描平面與垂體結合部平行。

sentences.english: He sloshed the soup over the tablecloth when he put his spoon into it.
sentences.chinese: 當他用匙舀湯時，他把湯潑濺在臺布上了。

sentences.english: My keys dangled from a chain.
sentences.chinese: 我的鑰匙串掛在匙鏈上。

sentences.english: Keyring production for many years more to temper our quality.
sentences.chinese: 多年的匙扣生產更加錘鍊了我們的品質。

sentences.english: The R&D activities concerning electron beam welding (EBW) keyhole dynamics and, EBW mechanism were reviewed briefly in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了電子束焊接機理和匙孔動力學的研究成果。

sentences.english: Depigmentation of the hair and spooned nails point to malnutrition.
sentences.chinese: 頭髮脫色和匙狀甲表明營養不良。

sentences.english: The movement of the pick through the keyway also leaves forensic evidence in several places.
sentences.chinese: 單鉤在匙路活動時也會在不同的地方留下痕跡證據。

sentences.english: After drinking coffee, where have to you put the spoon?
sentences.chinese: 喝完咖啡，你應怎樣擺放咖啡匙？

sentences.english: On the table was placed horizontally in front of the forks and spoons, is to eat Dessert time of the utensils.
sentences.chinese: 至於在桌上前方橫放的叉和匙，是喫甜品時用的餐具。

sentences.english: The advantage of this system is that it is very simple, inexpensive and almost immune to weathering.
sentences.chinese: 匙系統的優點是使用簡單，成本低廉，不怕日曬雨淋。

definition: spoon/ladle/CL:把[ba3]/abbr. for 公勺[gong1 shao2], centiliter (unit of volume)
Qingshui (place name)/Shimizu (Japanese surname and place name)
